  "requestBody": {"size":0,"query":{"bool":{"must":[{"term":{"metricset.name":"cpu"}}],"filter":{"range":{"@timestamp":{"gte":"now-1m","lte":"now","format":"strict_date_optional_time||epoch_millis"}}}}},"aggregations":{"status":{"terms":{"field":"host.hostname"},"aggregations":{"hex_metric":{"avg":{"field":"host.cpu.usage"}},"sorting":{"bucket_sort":{"sort":[{"hex_metric":{"order":"desc"}}],"size":10}}}}}},
  "requestBody1": null,
  "requestBody2": null,
  "requestBody3": null,
  "apiUrl": "/metrics-system.cpu-*/_search",

widgetConfigurationJSON:
{
  "requestBody": {"size":0,"query":{"bool":{"must":[{"terms":{"hex_devicecategory":["Server"]}}],"filter":{"range":{"@timestamp":{"format":"strict_date_optional_time||epoch_millis","gte":"now/d","lt":"now+1d/d"}}}}},"aggs":{"os_type":{"terms":{"field":"hex_hostos"},"aggs":{"numerator":{"filter":{"bool":{"filter":[{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"monitor.status":"up"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}}]}},"aggs":{"host_up":{"cardinality":{"field":"hex_hostname"}}}},"denominator":{"filter":{"bool":{"filter":[{"bool":{"should":[{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"monitor.status":"down"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}},{"bool":{"should":[{"match_phrase":{"monitor.status":"up"}}],"minimum_should_match":1}}],"minimum_should_match":1}}]}},"aggs":{"status":{"terms":{"field":"monitor.status"},"aggs":{"host":{"cardinality":{"field":"hex_hostname"}}}}}},"percentage_up":{"bucket_script":{"buckets_path":{"numerator":"numerator>_count","denominator":"denominator>_count"},"script":"(params.numerator != null && params.denominator != null && params.denominator > 0 ? params.numerator / params.denominator : 0)*100"}}}}}},
  "requestBody1": null,
  "requestBody2": null,
  "requestBody3": null,
  "apiUrl": "/heartbeat-*/_search",
  "apiUrl1": null,
  "apiUrl2": null,
  "apiUrl3": null
}
